cause.description:
Wolves are being Hunted down as we Speak. ATTENTION! Wolves are beautiful and graceful creatures that have been misunderstood﻿ by people for centuries. If you believe you have a good conscience and want to spread the good word about them, SUPPORT WOLF RECOVERY!!!
1. Wolves MUST be saved now. So they can live
2. So we can have Wolves in the world
3. SAVE THEM
cause.name: Save the Wolves
